name: Druidic
effects: you know Druidic, the secret language of druids
you always have Speak with Animals prepared
limits: others detect a hidden Druidic message with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Investigation) check but cannot decipher it without magic
notes: Druids and others who know Druidic automatically spot such hidden messages.
